name: EVOLVEd: Echoes Of The Codex War
name_original: EVOLVEd: Echoes Of The Codex War
description:
In the year 2138, in the city of Junseishima, three teenagers have recently, for unknown reasons, gained superpowers. Their search for answers leads them to the abandoned Tohishido Manor, and a record of a long-forgotten war―the Codex War.

Crew

Written by Shoji Amasawa

Programming: Reika Aoyama, Shoji Amasawa, Frank Gutiérrez

Art: Enrique Carmena

Original 3D sets: Shoji Amasawa

Music: Greyberry

Sound Design: Seiji Amasawa

Cast

Emi: Trina Deuhart

Eishida: Youngee Brummet

Hanako: Anairis Quinones

Hero: Steven Kelly
